reviews.text: Very poor car parking, badly laid out car park with lots of wasted space and traffic wardens on the prowl. I will make a nuisance of myself parked legally in residential streets rather than out of the way on the carpark just not in a bay. What an irritation that this very convenient station is only usable by 15 car users no wonder there is no incentive to move to public transport.
Great little station that really helps access to Walsall and Birmingham... cheap too!!
Very cold in the winter, indoor shelters don't really keep the cold air out. Government contractors are very good at salting the ground to stop people falling over.
No real shelter from the elements. Seats are more like perches for about 6 people. Poor train service times.
Small station with a shelter, although if it's too cold the shelter won't do anything.
